mapper.select: select case when exists( SELECT * FROM ujcms_dict WHERE type_id_ = #{typeId} ) then 1 else 0 end as non_zero_exists
mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_dict where type_id_ in(select t.id_ from ujcms_dict_type t where t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ujcms_dict set type_id_ = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id_ = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value_ = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_ = #{order,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, sys_ = #{sys,jdbcType=CHAR}, enabled_ = #{enabled,jdbcType=CHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_dict (id_, type_id_, parent_id_, name_, value_, remark_, order_, sys_, enabled_) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{sys,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.type_id_, t.parent_id_, t.name_, t.value_, t.remark_, t.order_, t.sys_, t.enabled_
